revised_title: Vibrational Bending Frequencies and Intensities in Benzene Derivatives
tldr: The authors studied the bending vibrations of benzene derivatives and the dipole moment of the C-H bond. They calculated the frequencies and amplitudes of the vibrations using a simplified model and compared the results with experimental data. The study provides insights into the intensities of vibration bands and the dipole moment of the C-H bond in benzene derivatives.
